name: Batchable

methods.name: execute
methods.signature: public Void execute(Database.BatchableContext jobId, List<sObject> recordList)
methods.description: Gets invoked when the batch job executes and operates on one batch of records. Contains or calls the main execution logic for the batch job.

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Gets invoked when the batch job finishes. Place any clean up code in this method.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Gets invoked when the batch job starts. Returns the record set as an iterable that will be batched for execution.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Gets invoked when the batch job starts. Returns the record set as a QueryLocator object that will be batched for execution.

description: The class that implements this interface can be executed as a batch Apex
